title: Can we stop adding mini-skarners to these PvE events?
body:
As much as I love getting snagged by a scorpion that's buried under 30 spiders so you can't really see him, and then dragged into an instakill death laser...

Maybe...

Maybe we could...

Maybe we could just not?

I was at one point considering buying QSS but soon I realised it would be a waste because these skarners just keep ulting you. You can cleanse it but then you will get hit with a second skarner ult and so on.

Kind of. As much as I hate the skarners, you 'can' just spam your dash key at the second you cleanse it off. Generally I find this works to get away fairly often between the breaks when one lets go of you and before another latches onto you, should be the same with a cleanse.
Today I was fighting 4 skarners and they dragged me one after another... it was very fun...
It's almost like there are 4 members on your team that ALL have a way to get the skarner off you though.
Not if Kayn knocks you away and you end up alone with 4 skarners while your team is busy getting assfucked by him
Last night, there were eight in the boss fight with nothing else around. Kayn knocked me into them. I missed almost the entire second phase of the boss battle because I was never not ulted.
Well that's exactly what happened to me, except for the number of skarners

To the contrary they exist for the same reason the mob of kog'maws suddenly show up.

Your team has to work together to crowd control them to stop people from being dragged away or in Kog'maw mob case not being rained on by death lightning bolts.

They exist in these PVE games to reinforce teamwork and coordination.

Yea, the skarner even give you a free "assist me" ping when they kidnap someone so at least your team knows someone is in danger. I like the skarners. the big ones are fat targets for your team and usually taken down first and the little ones mostly run in random directions and almost never just attempt to punch anyone to death.
atleast reduce the duration of it. it is too long and they allways drag you into shit like storms etc, cus thats what you ran away from in the first place... often you die even from full hp

Why do you guys prefer whining than trying to counter first?

This sort of thing makes me fear that riot will tone down the game mode which will make it boring,but see,do you guys realize that stuns stop the skarners from dragging you? not even considering that you can kill them right away and that there are augments to prevents said thing
Alternatively the mini versions shouldn't have such a huge duration. There's literally no gameplay difference between their small and big versions.

i think if you're by your teammates, skarners can't drag you but i might be wrong, but I beat all the mission, i didn't have huge problems with the skarners because we just went 4 or 5 man yasuo for onslaught and there's a lot of knockups and yas ults
Skarner aren't that difficult to manage if you play as a team, as a guy who have finished every quest of the event, trust me, they aren't a prob.

You can stop that ability by cleansing the affected ally or interrupting the mob. Sona's augmented E can do the former, while Ziggs W, Malphite augmented E, Malphite R, or Yasuo Q can do the latter (the [info page](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/odyssey-extraction) says "your team can free you with crowd control effects" but doesn't specify the type, so I don't know if slows/roots will interrupt the ability as well).

Getting dragged is annoying as hell, but teamwork is effective against it.
All CC will stop all creep abilities. Jinx's Chompers, for example, will stop the Skarner ults, Kog attacks, etc.
Just dodge his skillshot, hehe
not to mention some weird ass {{champion:161}} who spam fireballs across the map and takes out 1/5 of your HP
So true it hurts.
I unironically like having the skarners tho. That's what sona cleanses are there for, y'know. And every character has something to deal with them.

Each scorpion has a cooldown on its dragging-into-hazardous-stuff ability, and hard crowd control prevents all aliens from using their abilities. Well, at least I can't remember one that used a skill while ensnared.

Some characters have less trouble with it. Yasuo with augmented range (gotta keep running though), or Jinx with Chompers augments, for example. With the general mindset that if they can't get to you, they won't invite you to any... hot, volcanic activities **cough cough**.
Just pink ward them lol
